snippet: The Major League Soccer team, jointly owned by the Yankees and Manchester City and set to start play in 2015, must find a site for a permanent home and construct it.
abstract: New York City FC, team that will enter Major League Soccer in 2015, will reportedly play its first three seasons at Yankee Stadium; team is jointly owned by the New York Yankees and Manchester City of England's Premier League.

byline.original: By ANDREW DAS and DAVID WALDSTEIN

lead_paragraph: The Major League Soccer team, jointly owned by the Yankees and Manchester City and set to start play in 2015, must find a site for a permanent home and construct it.

headline.main: New York City F.C. to Play at Yankee Stadium for Three Years
headline.print_headline: M.L.S. Team Said to Find a Home

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
keywords.name: organizations
